website_summaries.verdict: Solid and sophisticated, Swiss-made 43 mm titanium watch available in 19 variations of dial color and band construction.
pros: Made from high-quality materials including titanium,  hypoallergenic stainless steel, and scratch-resistant, anti-reflective sapphire crystal
Has removable bumper to preserve a defined bezel position and lend magnification effect for increased visibility
cons: Luminescent hands might not be strong enough for easy reading
There are several band options available, though there have been complaints about the comfort and clasping mechanism of some band styles

customer_reviews.title: Big, thick, ugly, clunky watch
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those watches that looks far better in photos than it does in person. As soon as I opened the box and took one look at it, I was already preparing the return. There's no excuse for a quartz watch to be this thick. I have automatic watches that are half as thick as this thing. Not only that, but this thing is just plain ugly. It looks like something meant for a kid, a "LEGO watch" as someone called it.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar

customer_reviews.title: Not better than OK and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I have several Victorinox watches. The automatics are excellent watches. The quartz models like this one are just OK and tend to be overpriced ($300). Of course I knew all this before ordering. I liked the color scheme for this watch. The green and red are great for each other. Why only 2 stars? The red 24 hour marking ring is etched on the inner surface of the crystal, not the dial itself. It's just distracting, at least IMO. I needed a knock around watch so I decided to keep it, but I can't get real excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: NBO

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, terrible clasping mechanism. Not much thought in the closure of the band.
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is very nice, and well made. The band is what attracted me to the watch in the first place. It is well made, and looks unique. The clasping of the watch is another matter. You almost need two hands each time [and you cannot use the hand the watch is resting on the wrist. It should have been a simple buckle with link, or velcro, or something. The box the watch came in is very unique as well. The back up band is plastic and not attractive at all. Knowing this beforehand I would have passed on the watch. I have since changed out the band to a leather one of the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Occhipinti

customer_reviews.title: Why Not?
customer_reviews.text: This watch is it. So people ask "why do you need a watch that can stand being driven over by a tank". I answer this with another question, " Why not?". You have to see it and wear it to appreciate its beautiful and elegant craftsmanship. It is simply a thing of beauty. No fancy or over the top useless appendages. It's simply an elegant watch that can take a beating and go to the ball right after. So again, why not? I am a huge fan of Victorinox because its never let me down, has shown excellent craftsmanship, and this watch is living up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: A to the D

customer_reviews.title: Red I.N.O.X with steel bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Tough, beautiful and very dressy watch. I changed the original red rubber strap for a genuine INOX stainless steel bracelet to have the best of both worlds and a customized look for my red INOX ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Jose Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for me
customer_reviews.text: It has been difficult for me to find a watch that has all the requirements I need for work. I have destroyed a few watches in my time. I do have a couple watches costing more than this Victorinox, but I don't wear them to work. I need waterproof, decent looks, accuracy, and toughness (which should include a sapphire crystal). I have a little trouble reading the digital watches quickly and I also prefer the luminous hands rather than a backlight. I have had other tough watches that were also waterproof, but lacked the sapphire crystal and they get pretty scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have a collection of watches, both, automatics and quartz. I like my automatics and rotate through them (they are dress watches) and use them when I travel. I use my quartz watches for everyday wear. Now this watch is just beautiful. The looks are classical and the case is stylish, just a great watch. The only problem is it looses about a minute a month and this isn't good for a quartz watch ( my automatics lose maybe a second a month), so this is not good. The case is stainless steel so while it is tough I have a few scratches on my watch. I still wear this watch on a daily basis and love the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a competitive price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch at a very competitive price (particularly given that it comes with a Victorinox warranty). Striking design. Hefty, substantial construction (you can see how they say you can drive a tank over this). Strap is a little uncomfortable -- not as flexible or soft as other silicone watch straps in my collection -- so, I'll likely replace it soon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nowick

customer_reviews.title: A valuable and practical timepiece!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Victorinox watch. I really like the quality that they make. It is good for casual wearing and outdoor activities using! The titanium case is really light weight compare to my Seiko stainless case watches. Moreover, the 3 layer of sapphire glass is very strong of anti-scratch and easy to read in 90% of angels without glares. I was concerned about the 43mm diameter might be to big to my small wrist, but it is good size to fit my wrist. I strongly recommend the buyer to consider this INOX titanium series product, if you really want a watch for conventional and outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Ting

customer_reviews.title: A Handsome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've investigated this INOX watch for some time, read all of the pro's and con's, and decided that I would add this model to my collection. Although I've just recently purchased it I've been quite pleased with it's quality, look and overall handsome appearance. If it is as tough as it's made out to be then it will be a nice addition to my collection. A very handsome time piece.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase with two very small BUTs
customer_reviews.text: So excited to see this watch, which I’ve been hunting for a year, not only become available but also at a great discount. The watch itself did not disappoint - well made, well finished, beautiful and rugged. My only disappointment was the presentation box. I know these INOX watches usually come in a nice felt-lined plastic box, but mine came in a simple little black cardboard box with a foam insert supporting the watch. Compared to the discount I got though, not a big deal. Overall very pleased. **** UPDATE **** Another minor disappointment: the battery gave out less than 2 months into ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: interesting paracord band
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in getting an INOX watch because I like the case and dial, but I did not like the look of the rubber bands that came on the original versions. The paracord bracelet on this special edition really makes it stand out, and if you really like the rubber band, there's one in the box so you can switch back and forth. One of the articles I read about this edition said there would also be a swiss army knife in the box, but there is not. The buckle system for the keeping the paracord band on your wrist is not the greatest for getting the watch on and off, but it is easily adjustable and relatively comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This Luminox Inox quartz movement watch is awsome. I acquired it a month ago. The watch face is great, the watch is heavy but I like that, heavy duty steel, it's an all terrrain watch. Cool bracelet. Feels comfortable in my wrist. Very accurrate time, easy to read, the glass doesn't scratch easily (no scratches yet), water resistant proven. Then why I gavet it 4 stars ?: the luminous hands system is very minimal for a Victorinox watch
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for him for a Christmas present. He is really hard on watches since he is always tinkering around and working in the garden and in the wood shop, he needs something that can withstand a lot. He loves this watch! It has it's own kind of classy and it is indestructible!
customer_reviews.author: Cheer

customer_reviews.title: Good mid tier quartz that’s not a G Shock
customer_reviews.text: Lume is poor. Heavy watch and unusual deployment clasp takes some learning to understand how to use. But if you can get it for below $200 it’s a 70% decent buy, no brainer if you get it for even less...anything below $150 this is a 90% good buy. Screw down crown and simple dial makes it a very utilitarian choice. Otherwise go with a Casio MDV-106 for budget or a Citizen Promaster Tough for better specs at near price range.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Well I have just recently received the watch and everything seems to be in order except a small scratch on the underside of the bracelet. The scratch is deep enough to feel with your finger like its been created with s small nail or pin like object. I know some people will say that it is only on the underside so whats the problem? Well when I do spend money on watches I just don't want to receive damaged ones no matter how minuscule that damage is, especially on a watch that markets is toughness. Also the hands don't hit the minute markers, but that's something most quartz watches have even at the higher quality range.
customer_reviews.author: A watch Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, but hard to read at night
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very rugged and durable and besides night time, I really love it. My main problem with this watch is the illumination at night is really weak. I bought this to have a tough watch to go on all my backpacking and hiking trips with me. It is really hard to tell what time it is at night,especially if you are groggy. All the other aspects of it are great but this is a deal breaker for me and now I need to look elsewhere. I wish I hadnt spent so much on a watch that I cant read at night.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: One tough watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful, rugged watch!!! Great price and keeps good time!!! The only negative for me is the bracelet!!! It is aggravating to close the clasp, but it is a very secure clasp—just what a diver would want I’m sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Already have a couple Victorinox INOX watches. For the price on that one, I had to get it. I've been wearing this style/model for years. Had never let me down. This is the type of watch that will last you for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Paracord strap difficult to put on.  Watch itself is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: The actual watch is very nice, but the paracord strap is difficult to put on. And it's a pain in the rear to remove the strap to install the rubber one that comes with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch that's just the right weight and size... easy to read, too. Case & band tend to show wear but it's not a detractor for me. Battery had to be replaced 16mos after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Titanium makes this model stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Titanium is solid and very nice accent colors with folded “crown” this piece has! Light but bold at the same time make this watch my best choice. Rubber band is great and well made. Gray matches with all. Sporty and classy look for any occasion. Brand? Victorinox is Swiss and one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: L.F. Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Look how nice is my NO-WATCH
customer_reviews.text: The box simply came empty and I'm supposed the make a police report from Costa Rica... that's a little hard. Very disappointed from Amazon, I thought it was a lot better than that. By the way, this is not my last buy, that will be the other exactly identical watch that I buyed right away thinking Amazon will give money back for the first ghost watch... which is not happening... In defense of the Swiss Army Watch, it is great and very cool... they are not guilty for Amazon terrible control on delivery and post-selling service.
customer_reviews.author: Ticobuyer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Authenticity
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch, however I question the authenticity. The box was a bit sketchy and not the same as shown in the product photos. Even the instruction manual looked questionable in regards to quality. I would rather wear a $10 watch I bought at a drugstore than something I don't think it's real. I will be sending this back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Hexachrome

customer_reviews.title: Essential Swiss Watch
customer_reviews.text: Like an analog G-shock. One of my most trusted watches when it comes to accuracy, durability and comfort. Other watches might come and go from my collection, but the INOX stays.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Jaber

customer_reviews.title: It is a great watch to buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Actually fits great on my smallish wrist. Only two things to consider when buying 1, the box is the low point of this watch. I did expect to be a better box. 2, the metal bracelet is not a folder clasp. As picture shown, is detachable at the clasp. Wearing it might be a hassle. But i dont mind those potential issues, but you might. Potentially be the only heavy duty watch I own that might still works in the next 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Wai Chee Hui

customer_reviews.title: Quality Swiss Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: High quality Swiss Made Timepiece for a very reasonable price. The clasp does take some getting used to as it is not easy to put on and take off but practice makes perfect! Overall 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: CTJ

customer_reviews.title: Victorinox needs more love.
customer_reviews.text: It's literally a tank. Amazing watch. I have more expensive watches than this and I am, always in awe at how well this is made.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Robust
customer_reviews.text: It is quite robust (tall) and, despite being a 43mm watch, its dial is not that big. And that's not a flaw at all, It is just an observation. I have a big wrist, but I realized that it also looks great on people with smaller wrists. I am very satisfied and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Thamm Seixas de Santana

customer_reviews.title: I.N.O.X. watches has a cool new addition
customer_reviews.text: I added this watch to my other two I.N.O.X. watches, and am glad I did! The moisture proof scrap doesn't feel cheap or rubbery. This watch will probably end up being worn much more than my other leather strap watches.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Willis

customer_reviews.title: Rugged High Quality Watch
customer_reviews.text: Attractive well made sturdy and comfortable watch. Really like it!
customer_reviews.author: FLBoater

customer_reviews.title: good material, hard strap, dim lume
customer_reviews.text: the strap is hard and not comfortable the case is well made and solid though, but the weight make it unbalanced on the wrist but the lume is so dim that it is not very visible in the dark, it is much dimmer than my 150 dollar seiko
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Locking bracelet is a total failure.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a solid well built watch. My only problem is the lock on the stainless steel bracelet. It is such a bad design and you WILL drop your watch while trying to lock the clasp. I really do like this watch so I will most likely change the bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT S

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!  Love quality....hate clasp
customer_reviews.text: High quality and good looking watch. With a deploymant clasp, this review would be 5 stars...the buckle clasp sucks....4 stars because of the clasp. I'm used to sliding watch off wrist without holding the watch...easy to drop with this clasp.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So much for their ‘legendary’durability
customer_reviews.text: Fell onto the floor after 18 months of ownership from approximately 3 feet high. Watch stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisd

customer_reviews.title: For about 250$, it is a steal..
customer_reviews.text: Best Swiss watch you can buy at 250$ price range.
customer_reviews.author: Fahri Sinan

customer_reviews.title: A stellar timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: The specs to price ratio are ridiculous! Only paid $299 at the time of purchase for the quartz movement, stainless steel bracelet version. Swiss made, rugged, built to last and it looks spectacular on the wrist. A great all purpose everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: sect404

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with the newer advertised box.
customer_reviews.text: First of all i want to state that the watch itself is absolutely beautiful! My problem however is that it came in the old Victorinox packaging while the advertisement pictures show the new and much nicer box. As this watch was a present it would have been much nicer to have gotten it in the promised packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Built like a tank. Highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Randy McGee

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful, solid and free of unecessary
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Victorinox watch. It is beautiful, solid and free of unecessary, to me at least, doodads and baubles. I've had Tissots, Cymas and Oris over the years. As they say, Time will tell with this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch.....SS scratches a bit easy but holding up well otherwise
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: The seller is NOT an authorized dealers, the manufacturer warranty may not be honored
customer_reviews.text: The web page of the product on Amazon misrepresented the actual product. We did not receive what was shown (did not receive the watch with the beautiful box, extra strap and warranty booklet). We were also not made aware that the seller is not an authorized dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: ... it 5 stars because the case gets scratched very easily. Other than that
customer_reviews.text: I am just not giving it 5 stars because the case gets scratched very easily. Other than that, I think this is a great watch and I use it every day. Feels very sturdy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I am a St. Louis Cardinal fan, so the color is perfect. The watch is functional and attractive. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: THIS WATCH IS A JOKE
customer_reviews.text: The price for this watch should be $50.00. THIS IS A JOKE NOT THE WATCH.
customer_reviews.author: Ljubinka Tobdzic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It is more beautiful than it looks at the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Villa J

customer_reviews.title: My piece was an display piece open case or something.
customer_reviews.text: Probably an exhibition piece or an open box. Is not brand new, came with a dent in the front case. No papers, nothing. Dissapointed. UPDATE: Less than a mont later the battery died. Confirms my theory that was a display open box watch. It was not brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Efrael33

customer_reviews.title: Great watch - slightly heavy but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch with luminous dial, fits beautifully on the wrist. The size is okay and the red second hand on a blue backdrop looks sleek. The only negative is its slightly heavy. Otherwise value for money watch.
customer_reviews.author: Holy_AE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beater watch.
customer_reviews.text: An amazingly solid watch. You can feel the quality in the heft of this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, awful band
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch itself but we have had to have the band reattached 3 times in 2 years the pins don't stay in and are now replacing the band altogether. disappointing that it doesn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for a casual watch. He has had this brand before and likes them. This one is a little heavier but he likes it as well and likes the band being more durable than leather.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Waddle

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, understated styling and quartz - I no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Victorinox hit it out of the park with this one. Rugged, beautiful, understated styling and quartz - I no longer find myself enamored of the automatic mystique. Just give me something that looks great, can handle some abuse and stays accurate no matter what knocks it sustains.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful watch. Looks fantastic and feels like a quality time piece
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: For a swiss made watch I expected a little better, but I think I'll keep it
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch. Mine has some quality control issues. The second hand does not align with the second markers. For a swiss made watch I expected a little better, but I think I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: ETC

customer_reviews.title: Solid Swiss Army watch at an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid Victorinox watch. Great blue face with blue rubber strap. Strap is a bit short, but I have large wrists. Love the weight of this watch and you simply can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nicholas Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: High quality, reliable, a bit expensive but well worth it. This is the second INOX I buy in three years.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES DUARTE

customer_reviews.title: Different type of clasp
customer_reviews.text: Can someone help me about the bracelet?Its different clasp in description and what I received. Here is what I got. Should I keep it with this one?
customer_reviews.author: Bojana

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I think is 100% authentic
customer_reviews.text: Just received the inox titanium black dial. I think everything is fine with the watch, leather strap with the victorinox marks, lume, runs ok. The reason of 4 stars is because the is no books and warranty but i already knew there was no manufacturer warranty. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Eugenio

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very good watch for the price. Durable as hell, comes with an interesting shock absorber, but also good looking for an everyday wear. Nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily , not recommended for daily wear
customer_reviews.text: This watch scratches very easily and should not be used for everyday wear. The material scratches easier than other watches that I have owned with the same material . Wearing the bumper to avoid scrapes takes away from the appearance. It is a nice looking watch. It was fairly easy to size.
customer_reviews.author: om

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, fits perfect in my wrist
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, fits perfect in my wrist, is not a big watch... perfect for any occasion. The build is strong and strap fits nice.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo

customer_reviews.title: This is a good watch I am happy with it It's been in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good watch I am happy with it It's been in the ocean many times. I would buy again . Would be nice if it had a light for the nigh.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Construction is very rugged. Green watch face color is more muted than it appears in photo.
customer_reviews.author: Noam DePlume

customer_reviews.title: loving this watch, take on every excursion I go ...
customer_reviews.text: loving this watch, take on every excursion I go on, stylish enough for the office and tough enough for my outdoor adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. She did a "Happy Dance". This is a perfect watch for a perfect price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Different clasp
customer_reviews.text: Can someone help me about the bracelet?Its different clasp in description and what I received. Here is what I got. Should I keep it with this one?
customer_reviews.author: H.S

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, needs a better clasp.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this watch, only negative feedback is the clasp is really a hassle to open/close. Odd design choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I.N.O.X. Rocks
customer_reviews.text: This watch keeps great time, looks amazing and feels great on the wrist. Tough to change wristband pins yourself. Really is a stunning watch.
customer_reviews.author: lclarkel

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: I like the combination of colors and how they match. It will add a touch of class to my Scouter uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Livier González Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Great machinery, regular bracelet
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself was great. But the bracelet “just so so”. I recommend maybe another color or the steel version
customer_reviews.author: José Armando Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch. Easy to read, good weight, nice band and clasp. Great choice
customer_reviews.author: Rickie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Watch review
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping at a very nice upscale store and this watch caught my eye. I have worn a Rolex for a long time, but it didn't have the date. So I decided to look on Amazon and found the very same watch, much less expensive, so I went for it. Glad I did. I have been very happy with it and get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: this has been great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband who needed a watch that can withstand some hard wear. So far, this has been great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Good solid watch
customer_reviews.text: First time I'm wearing a Victorinox. The product hasn't disappointed! The plastic protector makes the watch look cheap though. Not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chichi

customer_reviews.title: Get the rubber strap. You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. The weight alone makes it that much better. Feels extremely sturdy and I would definitely recommend this watch
customer_reviews.author: Miron Andres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, Not to heavy. I like the rubber strap very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks fantastic. And not that big too. Received it in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi Shengelaia

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the watch
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the watch, but I don't care for the band. It has a fairly sharp edge that pinches the skin, and the clasp is difficult to fasten with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Leith Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy and fancy watch
customer_reviews.text: Great and heavy watch. Great resistance. I got it in red and it looks amazing wearing both suit or casual clothes.
customer_reviews.author: BARC

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, fair price, brand new in factory ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, fair price, brand new in factory sealed box and warranty. real deal at 1/3 list price. Thank you Santa.
customer_reviews.author: Dereck

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice looking, comfortable watch, however, the hands are not luminous
customer_reviews.author: vincent vitolo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, sober, elegant and robust. I totally recommend it. Seller was trustworthy and everything worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Vidal Pradenas

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch and have been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I love this watch and have been very happy with it. Hefty, solid, but like all S.A. products it's built well and to last. Beautiful watch and stainless band. The cons. Clasp is hard to open. Scratches show up on the gloss parts of face and band. And it is recommended every few years to have a $150+ overhaul at a S.A. registered service center? I could understand this for an automatic but this is a battery powered watch - I bought this to ease the cost of ownership after owning a costly automatic.
customer_reviews.author: KJLANDA

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, ultra tough and looks better in life, pics don't do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Khris Narsimullu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch.
customer_reviews.text: A bit more substantial in size than I was expecting but I love it. As another reviewer stated, only improvement would be if it were an automatic/mechanical movement.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great place to shop
customer_reviews.text: Could not of been happier with the whole process from payment to tracking of package and then pick up with definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Watch is exactly as nice as I expected. Robust watch with great looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jarkko Volotinen

customer_reviews.title: Best Swiss Watch Option for this Value!
customer_reviews.text: This a very reliable, strong, stylish and quality swiss watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I love them all
customer_reviews.text: This caught my eye at Macy's but Amazon beat their price by a couple of hundred dollsrs. This is my 4th Victorinox , and I love them all.
customer_reviews.author: nora garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and really liked by my watch loving husband
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine43221

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice casual watch. Proud to wear it on weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the green dial Victorinox INOX watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the green dial Victorinox INOX watch. The bracelet is top quality rubber strap. The dial is beautiful. My 20th watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WEATHER OR TIME?
customer_reviews.text: IT LOOKED FINE UNTILL ONE MONTH AGO " IT MAKES WATER" BY SHOWERING. NEVER USED UNDERWATER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great watch with comfortable leather strap. This is the second Swiss Army watch Ive purchased. The strap on the first one broke after one year so we'll see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: drc95

customer_reviews.title: Good Watch
customer_reviews.text: Cool Watch. Looks like the picture. Heavy and rugged. Dressy and casual at the same time. Good price from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case design, comfortable strap. Wears smaller than suspected on small wrist. Great allround build quality
customer_reviews.author: Cobus Gerber

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent watch!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is great. It looks runs well and looks excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great ! strong !
customer_reviews.text: Super stainless watch. It's tough and sublime. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Masaya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch that came quickly, brand new in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Folickman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch...Extremely accurate and comfortable despite being slightly heavy but you don't notice the weight while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Downs

product_meta.title: Victorinox Swiss Army Men's I.N.O.X. Watch
product_meta.description:
I.N.O.X. Carbon Watch. This 43mm men's dive watch comes with paracord strap, rubber strap or stainless steel bracelet. This ultra-sleek watch transitions from the office to the weekends and is ready to adventure from trails to oceans. 

FEATURES 

Durable Strap.Naimakka I.N.O.X. strap, durable rubber strap or high-grade stainless steel. Dependable Swiss Quality. High-quality materials are carefully crafted to create a piece you're proud to wear. Analog quartz movement. Removable protection bumper included. Superior Strength. Carbon composite case, stainless steel case or sand-blasted titanium. Water Resistant. Can reach underwater depths of 20 ATM/200 m./660 ft.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :7.09 x 5.51 x 4.72 inches; 10.58 Ounces
 * Item model number :241778
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :August 1, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Victorinox MFG
 * ASIN :B0728D57Y4

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #94,901 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #502 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #277 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #24254 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars419 ratings  I.N.O.X. Carbon Watch. This 43mm men's dive watch comes with paracord strap, rubber strap or stainless steel bracelet. This ultra-sleek watch transitions from the office to the weekends and is ready to adventure from trails to oceans. 

FEATURES 

Durable Strap.Naimakka I.N.O.X. strap, durable rubber strap or high-grade stainless steel. Dependable Swiss Quality. High-quality materials are carefully crafted to create a piece you're proud to wear. Analog quartz movement. Removable protection bumper included. Superior Strength. Carbon composite case, stainless steel case or sand-blasted titanium. Water Resistant. Can reach underwater depths of 20 ATM/200 m./660 ft.
feature_bullets: DURABLE LEATHER. Made from the same type of leather used to make firefighters' boots, this strap can withstand fire, water, salt spray and acidic substances. Still soft and supple, this leather is crafted for repeated wear, tear, twists and pulls.
SWISS MADE. This Swiss Made watch is made to withstand 130 extreme endurance homologation tests. Analog quartz movement.

TITANIUM. The I.N.O.X. Titanium watch case crafted from sandblasted titanium for a smooth, matte finish. Lightweight and hypoallergenic, this watch is functionable and fashionable with retro numerals overlaid with red 3D military-style time markings.

WATCH DETAILS. 43mm. Military time, date, end-of-life indicator, scratch-resistant, triple-coated anti-reflective sapphire crystal, screw-in caseback and screw-down crown. Removable translucent protection bumper. Water resistance: 20 ATM/200 m./660 ft.

TRUSTED QUALITY. Watches purchased from authorized retailers eligible for a 3-year limited warranty. Excludes battery life, normal wear and tear, improper handling, damage resulting from abuse, misuse, accidents or unauthorized repair.
